front.title: Export of MPLS Segment Routing Label Type Information in IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX)

abstract.t: This document introduces new IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX) code points to identify which traffic is being forwarded based on which MPLS control plane protocol used within a Segment Routing domain. In particular, this document defines four code points for the IPFIX mplsTopLabelType Information Element for IS-IS, OSPFv2, OSPFv3, and BGP MPLS Segment Routing extensions.
